metadata.synopsis: Father Abdirak is reading the book on torture techniques and considering which ones to try out next.

0.speaker: Abdirak
0.text: Yes - I must try this technique. Or perhaps this one...
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hand on chin, considering the book before him. InternalNodeContext: Pain Priest is reading his open bookNodeContext: He is reading a book on pain and torture techniques, musing out loud which to try, like someone reading a book on cupcake recipes and wondering whether to try buttercream or sugar icing next.
